newsitem.title: USA: Summit Tech completes unit sale.
newsitem.headline: Summit Tech completes unit sale.

text.p: Summit Technology Inc said Tuesday it had completed the sale of a subsidiary in a stock deal with LCA-Vision Inc.
Summit said in a statement it had sold its Vision Center subsidiary for about 17 million shares of LCA-Vision's common stock.
It said LCA-Vision had 36 million outstanding common shares, the price of which closed on the Nasdaq at 3-4/16 on Monday, near its year low of 2-1/4.
Summit said it planned to distribute about nine million of the shares to its shareholders after the shares had been registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
It said its former subsidiary owned and operated 19 vision centers across the country, each equipped with excimer lasers.
